course_details: This comprehensive course covers HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, and more. It includes hands-on projects and assignments to reinforce learning.
Learn the principles of responsive web design, including flexible grids, media queries, and responsive images, to create websites that adapt to various screen sizes.
This beginner-friendly course teaches the basics of JavaScript programming, including variables, loops, functions, and DOM manipulation.
Dive deeper into CSS with advanced topics such as flexbox, grid layout, animations, and CSS preprocessors like Sass.
This intensive bootcamp covers both front-end and back-end web development, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.
Learn React.js, a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces. Topics include components, props, state management, and hooks.
Explore Bootstrap, a front-end framework for building responsive and mobile-first websites. Covers grid system, components, and customization.
Master Angular, a powerful JavaScript framework for building single-page applications. Covers components, services, routing, and forms.
Learn how to use Python for web development, including frameworks like Django and Flask. Covers server-side scripting, database integration, and more.
